page.title: 02Loretta's Ashurst
page.content:
{Ashurst}is a little village with not many people. There is one pub, the Fountain. There is one telephone box, one pillar box, a twelfth century church, only six council houses. The rest are private and some have beams. There are no shops, we have to go to Partridge Green or Steyning for shopping. There is a playground but its only got a swing frame and a sand pit. There is a small school, only two classrooms, a small swimming pool and one computor and about three teachers. About 30 children in the juniors and more in the infants.
{Loretta}(aged 13)
